entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0195.10625] us-gaap:StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares has a value of 418,696 and has been used with the common stock member on the StatementEquityComponentsAxis. This element should not have a value when used with the common stock Member as us-gaap:StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares should not impact common stock. Change the opening balance share element to SharesOutstanding.
The properties of this us-gaap:StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares fact are: Period :2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : shares Rule Element Id:10625 Rule version: 26.0.9 - uamy_10k.htm 2

property.name: label
property.value: Common stock buyback and retirement, shares
